creator: bjan11@attbi.com
text:
When I run "ant build" using Java 1.4, I get an error ntvdm.exe failed. Error 
while setting up environmetn for the application. Changing JAVA_HOME to use 
java 1.3.1, everything works. Also using the same ant script on an NT2000 
system and java 1.4, it works. 

It is only on a Win XP using java 1.4 and ant 1.4.1 that the build fails.
